attributes.action: Mandate all MPs who join, leave or change political party to call a by-election.
attributes.background:
In 2015 nearly 3.9 million people voted UKIP, but due to the departure of it's only MP Douglas Carswell, now have ZERO representation in the House of Commons.
UKIP got more votes than the SNP and Liberal Democrats combined. 
More voted for UKIP in Wales than Plaid Cymru.
This is not democracy!

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, if you would like a by-election to be required in any seat where the MP changes his or her party, you could start a new petition asking for that.
